name: gcp-bq-reports
description: Market Pulse - AI-powered volatility prediction platform with BigQuery and multi-agent analysis

scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:prediction-agent && npm run install:frontend
scripts.dev:backend: cd apps/market-signal-agent && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- uv run python app.py
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/market-signal-agent && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- uv run python scripts/run_adk_api.py
scripts.adk:web: cd apps/market-signal-agent && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- uv run adk web
scripts.adk:web:log: cd apps/market-signal-agent && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- uv run python scripts/adk_web_with_logging.py
scripts.adk:api:log: cd apps/market-signal-agent && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- uv run python scripts/run_adk_api.py
scripts.lint:backend: cd apps/market-signal-agent && uv run ruff check
scripts.deploy:adk: cd apps/market-signal-agent && uv run python -c "import subprocess; result=subprocess.run(['uv', 'export', '--no-hashes', '--no-header', '--no-dev', '--no-emit-project'], capture_output=True, text=True); lines=[l for l in result.stdout.splitlines() if l.strip() and not l.strip().startswith('#')]; open('requirements.txt', 'w').write(chr(10).join(lines))" && uv run python scripts/agent_engine_app.py --env=prod
scripts.deploy:web: cd apps/market-signal-agent && uv run python ../web/scripts/cloud_run_deploy.py --env prod
scripts.deploy:web:dev: cd apps/market-signal-agent && uv run python ../web/scripts/cloud_run_deploy.py --env dev
scripts.deploy:cloudfunction: cd apps/market-signal-agent && uv run python scripts/deploy_cloud_function.py
scripts.deploy:cloudfunction:dry: cd apps/market-signal-agent && uv run python scripts/deploy_cloud_function.py --dry-run
